roleset.name: put up with something unpleasant

example.name: transitive
example.text: The new government will brook no delay inthe reconstruction of disaster areas, including industrial and spiritual activity.
example.arg: no delay inthe reconstruction of disaster areas, including industrial and spiritual activity.

roleset.note: BROOK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'brook' based on ectb2 instances, comparison with 'suffer'. No entry in verbnet. (from brook.01-v predicate notes)
